mil7.6.9:1.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘sappassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.6.9:1.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena paññāya caritabbaṃ, paññāya caramānassa kho, mahārāja, yogino cittaṃ ñāye carati, vilakkhaṇaṃ vivajjeti, salakkhaṇaṃ bhāveti.
mil7.6.9:1.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sappassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.9:2.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sappo caramāno osadhaṃ parivajjento carati;
mil7.6.9:2.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena duccaritaṃ parivajjentena caritabbaṃ.
mil7.6.9:2.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sappassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.9:3.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, sappo manusse disvā tappati socati cintayati;
mil7.6.9:3.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kuvitakke, vitakketvā aratiṃ uppādayitvā tappitabbaṃ socitabbaṃ cintayitabbaṃ ‘pamādena me divaso vītināmito, na so puna sakkā laddhun’ti.
mil7.6.9:3.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, sappassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.6.9:3.4: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā bhallāṭiyajātake dvinnaṃ kinnarānaṃ—
